title: Best Summer Games Fest 2023 Trailers
description:
Summer Game Fest 2023 just wrapped up and with it came a bunch of brand new trailers, gameplay and reveals. Here are some of our favorites that we got to see today including Mortal Kombat 1, FInal Fantasy 7 Rebirth, and Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2. 

00:00 - FINAL FANTASY VII REBIRTH – Summer Game Fest 2023 Trailer
03:24 - Mortal Kombat 1 - Official Gameplay Debut Trailer
07:23 - Alan Wake 2 Gameplay Trailer
10:41 - Sonic Superstars - Announce Trailer
12:23 - Exoprimal x Street Fighter 6 Collaboration Teaser Trailer
13:49 - Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown
15:36 - Path of Exile 2: Ngamakanui Teaser
16:38 - Honkai: Star Rail
18:11 - Lies of P Official Release Date Trailer
20:18 - Sand Land Official Trailer
21:05 - Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Co-op Campaign Reveal
23:19 - Baldur’s Gate 3: Jason Isaacs takes over the city of Baldur’s Gate
24:45 - Final Fantasy VII: Ever Crisis
26:15 - Like A Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Earsed His Name Reveal Trailer
27:51 - Immortals of Aveum – Official Colossal Assault Gameplay Trailer
31:02 - Fortnite Chapter 4 Season 3 WILDS Cinematic Trailer

title: Lies of P - 36 Minutes Of Demo Gameplay
description:
Lies of P is an upcoming 3rd person action game with a distinct "souls-like" style.

The game is inspired by Carlo Collodi's The Adventures of Pinocchio, involving a puppet takeover where puppets have gone mad and begun attacking everyone. While puppets are hated, Pinocchio seems distinct, and is able to break general puppet rules. Not being able to lie is a core Tennant of a puppet, and yet, one that Pinocchio can clearly break.

Lies of P releases August 2023 to PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and Steam

title: Final Fantasy 7: Rebirth Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Final Fantasy VII: Rebirth finally gets a full trailer. Barret, Tifa, and Red XIII look torn up in the beginning of the trailer. Gameplay was shown, with what looks to be how the open world will play outside of Midgar. We saw Chocobo Farms and Cosmo Canyon as well as other locations from the original game, plus the return of the FFVII: Remake combat mechanics. Scenes fans will recognize from the original Final Fantasy VII were shown off. Final Fantasy VII: Rebirth releases Early 2024 on 2 discs.

#summergamefest2023 #finalfantasy #gaming

title: Immortals of Aveum – Official Colossal Assault Gameplay Trailer
description: Immortals of Aveum is a Single player FPS magic shooter from Ascendant Studios and EA Originals. You control a Battlemage who comes from nothing, but comes into the power to control magic, and becomes a member of Aveum fighting for the control of magic in the everwar. Immortals of Aveum releases June 20, 2023 to PC, PS5, and XBox.

title: Fortnite Chapter 4 Season 3 WILDS Official Cinematic Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Watch the Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 4 Season 3 cinematic trailer: 

Find out what Fortnite WILDS is all about when a squad uncovers what's beneath the crumbling terrain. Danger is afoot, but so is adventure! Be on the lookout for mud, raptors, and vines as these will all play a key part in navigating WILDS. Plus, an Autobot bestows his likeness upon the Island. 

Take on the adventure of CH4S3 when the new season kicks off June 9th, 2023!

#summergamefest2023 #fortnite #gaming

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II & Warzone 2.0 New Warzone Map Vondel Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Call of Duty is releasing a new map, Vondel on June 14, 2023.

#summergamefest2023 #callofduty #gaming

title: Like A Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Earsed His Name Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Kazuma Kiryu returns in the all new spin-off of the Yakuza series, now titled Like A Dragon. The trailer shows over-the-top action, and Kiryu plows through enemies in the streets of Tokyo.

#summergamefest2023 #yakuza #gaming

title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 Date Announcement | Summer Game Fest 2023
description: Marvels Spider-Man 2 is coming out this year! It is set to release October 20, 2023.

title: Banishers Ghosts of New Eden Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
"Life to the living, death to the dead." You play as a banisher inBanishers: Ghosts of New Eden, an action RPG seeing you hunting ghosts. Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden releases end of 2023.

#summergamefest2023 #banishers #gaming

title: FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS Official Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Final Fantasy spin-off, Final Fantasy VII: Ever Crisis, gets an all new trailer that shows off the series' most iconic characters all together.

#finalfantasy #summergamefest2023 #gaming

title: Palworld Release Date Official Announcement Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Collect mysterious creatures and fight... with guns - no really. Palworld is the upcoming game that looks like Pokemon with guns... but isn't. Palworld sees Early Access January 2024.

#summergamefest2023 #gaming

title: Lord of the Rings Return to Moria Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Finally play as a dwarf in Lord of the Ring's: Return to Moria with a survival crafting element. Return to Moria releases Fall 2023.

#summergamefest2023 #sgf #gaming

title: John Carpenter's Toxic Commando Official Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
From the horror mastermind John Carpenter (The Thing, Halloween) and Saber Interactive, comes an all new co-op zombie horde shooter. The trailer showed off hundreds of zombies being mowed down with machine guns and big vehicles. The game is expected to launch in 2023.

#summergamefest2023 #sgf #gaming

title: Alan Wake 2 Gameplay Reveal | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Sam Lake, the creative director of Remedy Entertainment, took the stage to introduce the gameplay reveal of Alan Wake 2. The all-new trailer shows off the game's two protagonists, Saga Anderson and Alan Wake, and raw gameplay. Filled with jump scares, resource management, investigation, and menacing deer-headed foes. The game is expected to release October 17.

#summergamefest2023 #alanwake2 #gaming

title: Warhammer 40,000 Space Marine 2 Co-op Campaign Reveal | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Warhammer 40k: Space Marine 2's trailer showed off its gameplay as you'll take your marines and fight off against hordes of aliens. Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2 releases this winter.

#summergamefest2023 #warhammer40k #gaming

title: Exoprimal x Street Fighter 6 Collaboration Teaser Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Exoprimal had a surprising new trailer showing Street Fighter 6 collabing with Exoprimal. Cyborg Ryu and Guile are on their way! Exoprimal releases July 14, 2023, with the Street Fighter VI collab launching Fall 2023.

#summergamefest2023 #sgf #gaming

title: SAND LAND Official Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Based off the manga of the same name, Sand Land is an all new adventure game from the mind of Akira Toriyama. A release date is to be decided. 

#Sandland #summergamefest2023 #gaming

title: Lies of P Official Release Date Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Lies of P has players take on the role of Pinnochio in a dystopian world where puppets have taken control and humans are on the back end. Pinnochio is a special puppet in that he doesn't seem to be under the same puppet virus, and can break puppet laws, like not being able to lie. Lies of P takes heavy inspiration from Soulsborne elements and releases September 19, 2023.

#summergamefest2023 #liesofp #gaming

title: Sonic Superstars Official Announcement Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Get ready for Sonic Superstars, arriving Fall 2023!

Sonic and friends are back with an all-new look! Join Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, and Amy Rose on an adventure that takes "classic" to another level. Team up with friends, master new powers from the Chaos Emeralds, and speed through all brand-new zones on your way to take down Dr. Eggman (and co)!

#sonicsuperstars #sega #gaming

title: Witchfire Early Access Date Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Check out some gameplay action from Witchfire shown off during Summer Game Fest 2023. Witchfire Early Access arrives on September 20th, 2023. Wishlist now!

#witchfire #summergamefest #gaming

title: Mortal Kombat 1 Full Presentation and Gameplay with Ed Boon | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Ed Boon came to the stage to show off the latest iteration of Mortal Kombat, Mortal Kombat 1. Mortal Kombat 1's latest trailer shows off Raiden pulling in fan favorites Ryu and Scorpion - with the latest trailer finally showing gameplay. Expect bone breaking finishers and assists in the newest iteration. You'll be able to choose which attack your cameo fighter assists you in so you can better combo opponents. Ed Boon discusses Liu Kang creating a new universe as a fire god, and the major change-up in dynamics between formal rivals. Mortal Kombat 1 is set to release September 19, 2023.

#mortalkombat1 #summergamefest2023 #gaming

title: Mortal Kombat 1 Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
description:
Mortal Kombat 1 got its big gameplay reveal during Summer Game Fest 2023. The trailer showed off its iconic cast of characters like Nic Cage, Scorpion, and Sub Zero in a full blown reboot. We also got a glimpse of assist gameplay, calling in other characters into your fight. The game is expected to launch September 19, 2023.

#summergamfest2023 #mortalkombat1 #gaming

title: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
description:
Prince of Persia is back in classic style with a 2D action platformer. Prince of Persia's 2D iteration looks to be an action-heavy Metroidvania with incredible boss fights. Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown releases January 18, 2024. 

#summergamefest2023 #sgf #gamespot
